bloody amazing. cheers for this fella. I had a problem with an "unregistered script" (using vista) but found the solution at 
http://kb.adobe.com/selfservice/viewContent.do?externalId=kb401521
if anyone else needs it...

to use the key gen mech just:

launch the key gen programme
press the button "generate serial"
type in the serial number when prompted from adobe
you'll then be asked to authenticate this
i tried authenicate on line, it didn't work, so i clicked on authenticate by phone
you'll see it gives you a registration number to call through to them 
enter this registration number in to the space in the key gen programme
press the activate button
a brand spanking new serial number will magically appear
enter this where prompted into adobe
hey ho - it should work

I called and it was automated but it would not genereate a number  and suggested holding for a rep. if you can help you can email me at ken4u (at) bellsouth.net  thanks. I will keep looking. @ ken4u
1. You press "generate serial" in the keygen
2. Open photoshop, adobe will ask you to activate the suite.
3. Enter the serial you got from the keygen
4. Adobe will ask you to activate over the phone or over internet, select over the phone. DO NOT CALL THEM
5. There's a code they want you to give when you call them, enter that code in the keygen under the "generate key" button and press activate
6. Now you get a new key grom the keygen.
7. Enter that key in the adobe activation window there where they want you to enter the code you got from the guy on the phone.
8. Now the suite is normally activated

Let me know if it works and I'm sorry for my bad English

Absolutely wonderful download!!  Fully activated programs!  This was my first download and was a bit confusing but after reading through all of the comments I finally found directions that I could understand.  I'm going to change ilovethepiratebay's directions from below a little so the beginners can understand why they aren't activating their software and getting the comment "are you kidding"!!


1.  Install your software.
2.  Open photoshop, adobe will ask you to activate the suite.
3.  Open the keygen program and press "generate serial" in the keygen (do not close the keygen program)
4. Enter the serial you got from the keygen
5. Adobe will ask you to activate the software
6.  Choose additional options and select over the phone BUT DO NOT CALL THEM
7.  Below the serial number another code will appear
8.  Enter that code into the blank box on the keygen software and press activate
9. Now you get an activation code from the keygen.
10. Enter that key in the adobe activation window there where they want you to enter the code you got from the guy on the phone.
11. Now the suite is normally activated

Hope this helps!
